1112.content:
You were at the arcade, playing some random arcade game, just trying to beat the high score of the last guy who played it. After a few hours, some game tokens and a short bathroom break later you had almost gotten to the high score when suddenly you noticed something, out of the corner of your eye you saw someone, someone dancing. You tried to ignore it but for some reason your eye kept being drawn to the person dancing.

"*Boom!* Game Over! You lose!" the game laughed mechanically as you took your eyes of the screen one last time.

"Oh darn it" you groan. You were about to put another token into the machine but figured to heck with the game! You turn towards the dance machines and walk towards it to find a rather beautiful girl play not to mention out classing her opponent on the machine. She seemed rather skilled and in fact looked like a goddess as she trashed the foolish mortal's beside her. Scoring exceedingly high numbers of points then her opponent.

"Whoa..." you gasp surprised as the goddess continues to dance on the machine like a trained professional dancer. a few minutes go by but it felt more like hours as the world around you turned dark besides you and the dancer. You watch as the goddess' moves slow down as if someone hit the play button on the remote and made everything go all slow mo.

Soon however the goddess stopped moving all together and the world resumes it's normal flow. You watch as the crowd around the machine disbands and the goddess dismounts the dance machine. You try to approach the girl but a weird guy with bright yellow not to mention spiky hair cuts you off.

"Nice job Tea. You sure showed that bully not to mess with..." you stopped listening after that as you walked away.

"So her name's Tea? Maybe next time I can talk to her?" you shrug and walk off, heading home where you quickly turn in for the night.

...

The following day you head straight to the arcade just like yesterday but find that that Tea girl isn't there.

"Aw looks like she isn't here. Oh well might as well try to kill some time while I'm here" you thought to yourself as you look around at the small assortment of arcade games before you. You shrug and walk towards one of those basket ball games by the back of the arcade and begin to shoot some hoops.

...

A few hours go by and you eventually had played every single game in the arcade, well except for the dance machine the tea girl was using yesterday. you never were a good dancer but hey when in Rome...

You walk over to the dance machine and it suddenly flickers to life, startling you for a second. You quickly dart your head around and thankfully nobody noticed your little incident as you quickly climb back onto the machine.

"Select a song!" the machine chimed.

You gulped and quickly did so.

"Select your difficulty!" the machine chimed once more.

You decided to select sweet(easy) mode and suddenly arrows begin to appear on the screen. You quickly begin to dance along with the machine and to your surprise, you danced rather well.

for the next few minutes you dance on the machine, pulling a few free style moves out of your hat as you went on before suddenly the song came to an end and thus forced you to stop dancing.

You smile and put another token into the machine and continue to dance.

However after another hour your body was too exhausted and you were forced to get off the machine. You decide to head home after catching, figuring that the Tea girl wouldn't be showing up anyway.

Once home you eat some lunch and head to bed early. That night you dreamed of dancing with the girl named Tea. It felt rather real, perhaps you were having a lucid dream? It didn't matter because soon you woke up and the dream was gone.

...

A few hours go by before you decide to try the arcade again. How before you go you notice that it was a Saturday on the calendar.

'Hmm maybe she wasn't there yesterday because she had school? I was there until about 4pm so she might've come later then that?' you thought to yourself before heading to the arcade, hoping that you'd finally be able to see the Tea girl again.

...

You arrive at the arcade and instantly you find the place swarmed with people, it was a Saturday after all. You try and make your way to the dance machines and thankfully you find that only one person was on it, the Tea girl!

You watch as she dances for a little bit but after a little bit of watching you just couldn't help yourself and quickly run to the other machine besides her.

"Oh you wanna dance to?" she asked you. You nod and she smiles "Alright let's see what you can do!"

You nod and get ready as Tea selects a new song. You get ready and as soon as the song starts you begin to dance...
1112.title: At the arcade you see a beauty beyond words...

choices: ...is that guy in a turban following you?!
11123.content:
Hell's Bells! HELL'S BELLS!! This had to be an extremely rare event that had just occurred at this moment in front of dozens of spectators. When the song 'Save A Horse, Ride A Cowboy' ended, you and Tea practically dropped your jaws in disbelief. Not only did you both get 'AAA' rankings, you both had the exact same score at the end of the game! You: 33867543 points. Tea: 33867543 points! Down to the final digit, the both of you tied EXACTLY! An exact stalemate!

"Wow!" your opponent gasped impressed, "I dont believe it! We actually tied right on the dot!"
"Whoa," you gasped yourself, "that's gotta be like... next-to-impossible odds, too!"

Well, you didnt beat her, but you did achieve the next best thing! Accomplish a damn near impossible feat with her! The crowd cheered the two of you as you both stepped off the platforms. The adrenaline took it's time to pump out of your system. Mentally, you felt like you could dance all through the night, but physically you didnt wanna overdo it.

"Nicely done, rookie!" Tea smiled your way and called you a rookie, "it's not everyday I find someone that can actually keep up with me!"
"Th...thanks!" despite being called a rookie, her compliment really got to you, "that... that actually means a lot coming from you!"
"Eh, dancing's just been a dream of mine," she stated, "I guess we both share the same dream, huh?"
"Well, actually I kinda want to be a cop," you admit, "but dancing's a great demanding workout!"

"Wow! That was awesome, Tea!" and just when things were about to get interesting, a familiar voice from an all too familiar yellow spikey haired midget goes and spoils it all, "an actual exact-score tie in DDR! That's uh... that's special, right?" As much as you hated someone coming between you and a potential crush, you kept your cool and remained calm... though you HOPED deep down that little guy with a pyramid necklace wasnt her boyfriend!

"Oh! Perfect timing!" Tea announced, "I was just about to start the introduction! I'm Tea! And this guy's Yugi, a close friend of mine from school!" 'Close' friend, eh?
You kept your cool face on as little Yugi smiled up and offered his hand, "Hi! It's nice to meet you! Uh... what's your name?"
"My name's [****]!" you shake his hand... hm, little guy's got a firm grip! "and the pleasure's all mine!"
"Great job making a tie with Tea!" he was quick to compliment you, "That's really something! I NEVER saw her lose in this game!"
"Th...thanks!" man, that bright warm smile on this guy's face could melt ice cream! No wonder Tea's hanging out with this shrimp! He's got such an uppity aura about him that makes you all warm and fuzzy deep down! There's probably a story about this guy, but youre more focused on Tea to care about it!

"Joking aside, Yugi here's a REAL champion!" Tea spoke up before you ended up lost in the twinkle of Yugi's sparkling purpling eyes, "he's the winner of Duelist Kingdom and currently the reigning King of Games in Duel Monsters."
"That's great, Yugi!" you were good at pretending to be more interested than you already are, "how does it feel to have such a title?"
"It's... it's an experience," he stated with quite a bit of emotion in his voice, "I feel like I got the weight of the world on my shoulders... though technically, I do. And I didnt get this far on my own. I had a lot of support from those around me. A LOT of support." Dont stare into his eyes! Dont stare into his eyes!
"Aw, dont be modest, Yugi!" Tea cheered him on, "you earned it. You should be proud. We all are. Which reminds me, we still gotta make up all that homework we left behind going to that island." Yugi sighed as Tea turned her head to you, "Sorry we gotta cut this conversation short."
You nodded, "I understand. You wouldnt wanna let failing grades get in the way of your dream!"

Tea smiled, "I still demand a rematch, though. You got time tomorrow afternoon for a tie-breaker?" DO YOU?! Sure, you got an exam in world civilization on monday, but youre sure that's not as important as THIS!
"You can bet on it!" you immediately answer.

"Alright, play time is over," Yugi's voice suddenly got incredibly deep and manly and his aura was even stronger and more empowering than ever! Your eyes widened in shock as you notice him now suddenly a foot and a half taller and a couple years more mature! "we promised Joey we'd help him with his Geometry lessons, remember?" Your jaw literally dropped as you gazed in dumbstuck at the new Yugi! He just magically passed puberty in the blink of an eye!
"D-D-DID YOU JUST-"
Tea didnt seem the least bit surprised, "Alright, Yugi alright. I know how gets when we're late."
"Then let's go!" he grabbed her hand and started to drag him off with her. All the while you were STILL speechless from the Magic Growth!

"See you tomorrow, [****]!" Tea shouted at you.
"S....see ya!" you shouted back, still keeping that dumbstruck look on your face. You spent a little too long trying to wrap your head around what you witnessed. Finally, you gave up and shook your head, "Eh, forget it. It's none of my business!" The important thing is you got yourself a rematch with Tea tomorrow. Another potential chance to get closer to this dancing queen.
You've already done what you came here to do and since the adrenaline's wearing off, you should probably start heading back home.

"Ooph!" but just when you turned around, you accidentally bumped into someone. A rather tall someone. A rather tall dark-skinned someone in a white robe and white turban wielding a golden ankh-shaped key around his neck!
His soulless blue eyes gazed down at you with a distant stare... like he's in a daze or something.

"Er... s...sorry," you apologized before walking around him. You could feel the man still staring back at you as you walked away, but you ignored it. You focused on getting home and thinking about how youre gonna hit it off with Tea at the rematch!

"Yeah. He beat him with some good skill. At least he shut him up for a while and get him off my back." Alexis said.

"I'll say. But you know, Alexis, he can't be too bad. Maybe, you could give him a chance." Mindy suggested.

"Are you kidding me? Have you seen the way he looks at me? I can tell that he wants to grope me rather than date me." Alexis.

"You don't know if that's true, Alexis." Jasmine said.

"Oh yeah? I told him that I'm here to be the best duelist that I can be and not to date anyone. That includes Neo. If he can't get that through his head, then he's not fit to be here." Alexis said coldly.

You widened your eyes in shock as you feel your heart being broken. You start to tear up. But, managed to hold up and got really mad. You slowly walked up behind her and Jasmine and Mindy sees you and were scared by your angry expression.

"What's wrong with you two?" Alexis wondered.

"Uhh. Alexis?" Mindy said in fear as she points at you behind her.

Alexis turns around and jumped as she sees you standing with mad look on your face. You stayed silent for a moment before speaking your mind.

"Is that what you truly think, huh? Saying that I'm not fit to be here if I keep on going after you like a love sick puppy. I guess that it was just too good to be true." You said with a sad and angry tone in your voice.

"Listen, Neo, I-." Alexis was gonna explain. But, you cut her off.

"Save it! You already made it clear. You're just like everyone else." You said angrily.

"Wh-what do you mean by that?" Alexis wondered.

"I guess I should tell you since it's pointless, anyway. For the last 8 years, I've been kicked around, beaten up to the brink of death, and being talked garbage at. Everywhere I go, I hear people saying that I'm some low life disease that they wished to just die away. Even though I have Zeo and Leo, I can still feel the scars in my heart from the pain they caused to me. It wasn't enough to fill the gigantic hole in my heart. Even my own parents couldn't help me. So, I wished that one day that a girl would just come to me and just be with me because I want to make her happy. But, everytime I tried to, they reject me and say that I don't deserve anyone because I'm just some dork and some punk. After meeting you, I though that things would finally change now. But, it looks like I was wrong. You don't anything to do with me? Well, then do me a favor and stay out of my face." You said before going.

"Neo-." Alexis said but then.

"OUT!!!!" You screamed.

Alexis was frightened by the volume of your voice and you go to your dorm. Jasmine and Mindy were just standing there as they see Alexis starting to cry as guilt for what she did to you came over her. You stormed back to your dorm and slammed the door so hard that it left some cracks on the wall. Zeo and Leo heard it and they run to see you.

"Neo? What's wrong, Bro?" Zeo asked.

"Nothing! I'm fine." You said angrily.

"You don't seem fine." Leo said.

"I AM!! LEAVE ME ALONE!!" You screamed as you walked to bed.

12121212111111.title: Dark Neo's Path of Destruction

121212121111111.content:
We find Leo and Alexis after leaving Zeo back at the dorm to rest. They soon come across a frightened Slifer student next to an Obelisk.

"What happened to him?" Leo asked.

"Your brother happened," the slifer said.

"Neo?"

"Yeah, he had this scary monster called Wicked Avatar, it was like a black orb of nothing. Now he won't respond."

"Something's wrong. Neo would never do something like this. Not to mention this card you mentioned. I've never heard of it, and I know my brother never had a card like that."

"This is because of me," Alexis said. "If I hadn't said all that stuff, then he might not be..."

"Don't blame yourself Alexis. He's my little brother. I need to knock some sense into him."

They went searching for Neo, hoping to knock some sense into the troubled teen.


option 1: as Zeo is limping looking for his baby brother, he finds him, but can tell he's not himself
option 2: Leo and Alexis find Neo as he knocks another student out. Leo's gonna knock some sense into Neo
121212121111111.title: Leo and Alexis's P.O.V.

choices: Let's see how Zeo is doing
1212121211111111.content:
Leo and Alexis were going into the forest area to find Neo. They did. But, it wasn't so friendly as they see him took out another student and has a sick smile on his face in triumph. Leo knows that he needs to do what it needs to be done in order to save his little brother.

"Stay here, Alexis." Leo ordered.

Alexis nodded and stays hidden. Leo goes up to Neo believing it might be his biggest duel yet.

"I know what you've done, Neo." Leo said.

Neo turns around and sees his 2nd big brother standing right behind him.

"Leo. Who would've though you'd come to me yourself." Neo said not surprised to see him.

"You hurt that Obelisk guy and now him? This isn't like you, man. You wouldn't hurt anyone that's innocent." Leo explained.

"Innocent? Well, 'innocent' people like them has caused nothing but pain and misery to me. Now, the time for Karma has come." Neo said evilly.

"Look! I understand that you're hurting inside and it sucks. But, doing something like this will only make you feel worse. Please, let's go back to Zeo and we can sort this out." Leo said trying to reason with Neo. But, it's no use.

"No. I'm not gonna stop until everyone feels my pain. But, if you want to stop me, then let's see if you have what it takes." Neo challenged as he activated his duel disk.

"I was suspecting that this would happen. Alright, Neo! I accept your challenge." Leo declared as he activated his duel disk.

Alexis hides in the shadows as she watches the brothers battle to the death.

"Let's duel!" The brothers declared.

Neo: 8000

Leo: 8000

"I'll go first. I summon Mountain Sage, Regia in attack mode." Leo said.

Regia: 1600 ATK 1300 DEF

"Then I'll placed 2 card face down and end my turn." Leo said as he set the cards down.

"My turn now. Draw! I summon Destructive Spellmaster, Brioni in attack mode." Neo said.

Brioni: 1500 ATK 800 DEF

"Then I'll activate the spell card called Cursed Heart. This card gives my Dark Spellcaster monster an addition 600 attack points until the end of the turn." Neo said.

Brioni: 2100 ATK

"Now attack his Regia with Devilish Chant!" Neo declared.

The dark Spellcaster chanted a spell and Regia disappeared in flames.

Leo: 7500

"Then with her effect, since she destroyed a monster in battle, I can special summon one dark Spellcaster monster from my desk except herself in defense mode. I choose Illusion Apprentice." Neo said.

Illusion Apprentice: 1700 ATK 1500 DEF

"Then I'll play one card face down and end my turn." Neo said.

"Wait! During your end phase, I'll activate the trap Ancient Earth Flute. This will change your tune because now I can special summon one Earth monster from my deck as long as it's got 2000 ATK points or less since one of my Earth monster's destroyed by battle this turn. Come on out Trimaran, Hero of the Lands!" Leo declared.

Trimaran: 2000 ATK 1600 DEF

"Fine! Make your move." Neo said.

Alexis watched and she has never seen cards like what Neo has. He must've changed his deck. Whatever the case, she hoped that Leo brings back the old Neo. Because if not, who knows what he'll do with all of that hate and dark power.
1212121211111111.title: Downfall of a Family part 1

12121212111111111.content:
The duel continues to rage on as Neo was taking the lead with 8000 life points to his brother, Leo's 7500. Alexis watches from the background and hoped that Leo would bring Neo back to his senses and end this nightmare. That's when Jaden, Syrus, Chumley, Jasmine and Mindy showed up.

"Are you okay, Alexis?" Jaden wondered.

"I'll be fine. I'm just worried about these two." Alexis said looking at at Leo and Neo.

"Don't worry, Alexis. Neo will be back to his old loving self before you know it." Mindy said to cheer up Alexis.

"Wait! How do you know what's going on?" Alexis wondered.

"Zeo told us." Syrus answered.

"Is he okay?" Alexis asked in concern.

"Yep! He's getting care at the medical room." Jasmine answered.

"Oh thank goodness." Alexis sighed in relief.

"Looks like the duel just started, though." Chumley said.

"It did and I'm hoping Leo will win for Neo's sake." Alexis said.

Back to the duel, it was now Leo's turn. He draws his card to begin his 2nd turn.

"I use Trimaran's effect. Once per turn, I can special summon a Earth monster from my deck as long it's level is 4 or less. I choose Maiden of the Rocky Lands in defense mode." Leo said.

Maiden of the Rocky Walls: 1500 ATK 1100 DEF

"What are you planning do with her?" Neo wondered.

"You'll see right now. Trimaran! Attack his Brioni with Boulder Beam!" Leo declared.

Trimaran creates a boulder and shots a beam out of it and destroys the monster, making the duel a tie so far.

"Then I'll use my Maiden's effect. When a Earth monster destroys another one in battle, you'll take 400 points of damage for each it's level. Since Brioni is a level 4 monster, you'll take 1600 points of damage." Leo explained.

Neo: 5900

"I'll my turn from there." Leo said.

"My move." Neo said.

Neo was about to draw his card until he felt something. He smirks as he sees what he drew.

"Looks like your luck is about to run out soon, Leo. First, I'll play Pot of Greed to draw two more cards. Then I'll summon the monster known as Prince of Dishonest, Ralpher in attack mode!" Neo declared.

Ralpher: 2200 ATK 1900 DEF level 5

"Wait a minute! How can you summon a level 5 monster without tributing?" Leo asked.

"Simple. I can Normal Summon him to the this way since I have at least one Dark Spell-caster monster on the field. Then I'll equipped him with the spell called Dark Gift Staff. This increases my Ralpher's attack by 600 and it cannot be affected by other spell cards." Neo explained.

Ralpher: 2800 attack

"Not good." Mindy said.

"Go Ralpher! Attack Trimaran now!" Neo ordered his monster.

Ralpher destroys the monster and Leo took a big hit.

"Now for Ralpher's other effect. Since he destroys your monster, I can banish on of my Dark Spell-caster monsters from the graveyard and you take damage equal to half of your monster's attack." Neo explained.

Leo: 5700

"I'll play this card face down and end my turn." Neo said.

"Leo better hoped that he can think of something soon because this is gonna be huge problem right now." Chumley said.

"Agreed." Jasmine said.

Alexis sits there and sees the look of hatred and despair in his eyes. She still blames herself of the demonic transformation that happened to you. She really wished that she would never did what she did. But, it's too late. But, Leo maybe her only hope now.

He draws his card and he got what he needs to get his younger brother back to him.

"Let's do this! First, I'll play Call of the Haunted to bring back Trimaran from my graveyard." Leo explained as his monster comes back.

"Why do need him again?" Neo wondered.

"Because of this. You should this card, Neo. Since I have two monsters with Land in there card name on the field, I can sacrifice them to summon my ace." Leo said.

"Uh oh!" Neo gasped.

"Leonidas, the Gladiator of Quakes!" Leo said as his signature monster is now on the field.

"Leonidas: 3000 ATK 2800 DEF

"Sweet! He's got this in the bag now!" Jaden said.

Alexis feels happy that this could all end in this duel.

"Activate your ability, Leonidas! Earthly Judgement! When he's summoned when I tribute 2 monsters with Land, he can destroy all of your monsters that are less than his original attack." Leo explained.

Leonidas destroys all of Neo's monsters and Leo wasn't done yet.

"Furthermore, for every monster destroyed, you'll take 700 points of damage." Leo said.

Neo: 4500

"Then I'll play the spell Leonidas's Earthly Passion. This will increase his attack by 1000 until the end of the turn." Leo explained.

Leonidas: 4000 ATK

"This is for your own good, Little Bro. Now, Leonidas, attack his life points directly!" Leo declared.

The warrior brings up his blade and cuts right through Neo.

Neo: 500

"That should do it for now. I'll place this card face down. This is it, Neo. On my next turn, it's over and we go back to how things used to be. I just need one more turn to do it. I'm done." Leo said.

That's when Neo started to chuckle and then turned to an evil laugh. Everyone, including Alexis and Leo, are wondering on what's so funny.

"I'm sorry to disappoint you, Leo. But, there won't be a next turn." Neo said evilly.

"What makes you so sure." Leo asked.

"You're about to find out right now. But first, before you completely finished your turn, I'll activate Fires of Doomsday to get two Doomsday Tokens on to the field. Now I draw!" Neo declared.

"Now I'll play the trap card Escape from the Dark Dimension. This allows my to get back one of my banished Dark monsters. Return, Brioni!" Neo said as his monster comes back to the field.

"How are gonna end the duel with her and those tokens?" Leo asked.

"Because they'll be sacrificed for this card." Neo said as he holds up a card in his hand.

"Wait! Is that-?!" Leo asked in fear.

"That's right. And you're about to see it in action first hand. I sacrificed Brioni and my two tokens to summon the symbol of the Apocalypse itself. The Wicked Avatar!" Neo said out loud.

The skies turned dark as a thunder storm comes in. The winds got stronger as purple lightning comes in. Then everyone sees a huge black orb coming through the clouds and it spells terror all over it.

"What in the?!" Jaden said in fear.

"Not good! Not good!" Syrus said while shaking his legs.

"I don't think we should be here!" Chumley said as he wants to get outta there.

Alexis looks at the Wicked Avatar and she couldn't believe that Neo had this sort of creature. Leo has the same thought while staring at it.

"That's The Wicked Avatar?! That thing's huge!!!" Leo cried out.

"Well, if you think it's scary now, wait till it attacks. In fact, don't wait. First things first, the Avatar's attack points is always 100 points stronger than next strongest monster on the field. Since that's Leonidas, it's attack is now at 3100. Also, if you think a simple trap or spell could stop it, think again. Because, during the two turns after it was summoned, you can't activate any spells or traps." Neo explained.

"Say what?!" Leo said in shock.

"I know it's not enough to finish you. But, with Fissure, that's a different story." Neo said.

Leonidas is destroyed and now he's wide open for an attack.

"Now I'll play monster reborn to bring back Brioni. Next I'll use Megamorph to double it's attack since my life points are lower than yours." Neo explained.

Brioni: 3000 ATK

Wicked Avatar: 3100 ATK

"Wait, Neo! I'm begging you! Please don't go through with this!!" Leo begged.

"Too late for that. ATTACK!!" Neo ordered.

Brioni hits Leo first and he sees The Wicked Avatar closing in to end him.

Leo: 0

Leo then crumbled to the ground unconscious. The others were shocked to see all of that and they ran to see if he's alright.

"You're alright buddy?" Jaden asked.

"He's fine. He's just unconscious." Jasmine said.

Alexis turns to see Neo with a cold expression on his face and she was hurt by what monster he's become.

"Neo." Alexis said.

"Alexis. I'm not who I am anymore. So goodbye for now." Neo said before leaving.

"NEO! WAIT!!" Alexis called out. But he was already gone.

Alexis just stood there with her head held in shame.

"Neo. I'M SORRY!!" Alexis cried to the skies.
12121212111111111.title: Downfall of a Family Part 2

12121212111111112.content:
Meanwhile, Zeo is limping while looking for Neo. Leo said to stay and rest, but he couldn't do that when his baby brother was in pain. He ran into a couple of students who said Neo had a card called Wicked Avatar and was putting others in comatose. So naturally, he became more worried for his brother, fearing this Wicked Avatar was causing him to make bad decisions. As he walked, he heard voices, recognizing them as his brothers. He rushed to find them as...


option 1: Neo beat Leo, putting him into a coma
option 2: Neo was kicking Leo's butt, and helps his brother
12121212111111112.title: Let's see how Zeo is doing

121212121111111121.content:
As Zeo makes it to the dueling area of his brothers battle, he was too late as he sees Neo putting Leo out cold. Zeo, limply, goes over to Leo and sees that he's out like a light. Thank goodness he's alive, though. He looks at Neo looking at him with an evil glare.

"Neo. What do you think you're doing?!" Zeo asked Neo.

"Showing our brother my pain. He shouldn't have got in my way." Neo said.

"I don't know what's making you do this. But, you need to stop this now!" Zeo demanded.

"Or what? You can't stop me with that physical pain of yours. So, what chance do you have?" Neo wondered.

As much as he hates to admit it, Neo's right. Zeo could barely walk right now.

"I'll tell you what. Once you're all healed up, meet me at the Dueling Arena. We'll see what happens then." Neo said before leaving.

Zeo now needs to get Leo to the medical room and get himself ready to duel his younger brother.
121212121111111121.title: Brotherhood Destroyed

1212121211111112.content:
Zeo was told by Leo to get some rest. But, he wasn't going to let his baby brother, Neo, going around with extremely emotional scars in him. So, he limped to find him. Zeo turns around and sees Neo looking at him.

"Neo! There you are! Wait a minute." Zeo said as he sees the dark look in Neo's eyes.

"Hello, Big Brother. Feeling better? I sure hope so." Neo said evilly.

"Are you okay, Neo? Huh?" Zeo asked as he sees a couple of unconscious students around him.

"Did-Did you do all of this?!" Zeo asked in shock by what he sees.

"Yeah. What if it?" Neo wondered with no care.

"What happened to you? You'd never hurt anybody like this! What made you be like this?!" Zeo asked about his brother's actions.

"I've had it with the suffering I had to endure. So, it's time for someone to give them a taste of their own medicine." Neo explained.

"Is this about Alexis? Look, I know that what she said was wrong. But, it doesn't give you the right to do things like this. Just come back to us. We're family remember?" Zeo pleaded to Neo.

"Forget it! I'm not gonna take this lying down anymore. And if you want to get in my way, then it looks like you're gonna be my next victim." Neo said.

"When Leo and Alexis get here, we can settle this. Where are they?" Zeo wondered as he looks for Leo and Alexis.

"They're not coming? Oh well. Looks like you're on your own. Enough talk! Let's duel!" Neo said as he activated his duel disk.

"Looks like I have no choice. But, maybe if I can bear him, he'll come to his senses. Okay, Neo! Let's do this!" Zeo said as he activated his duel disk.

Neo: 8000

Zeo: 8000
1212121211111112.title: Feeling a Brother's Pain

12121212111111122.content:
Leo and Alexis goes to find Neo and hoped that they could find him before he causes anymore damage.

"Any luck?" Leo asked.

"No. I've got nothing." Alexis said.

"We have to find him. We just need to keep looking." Leo suggested.

That's when they heard voices from somewhere.

"That sound like Neo's voice." Alexis said.

"And Zeo's!" Leo said out loud.

"He must be dueling Neo." Alexis figured out.

"Then we'll have to move fast. Let's go!" Leo said before he and Alexis runs to the source of the voices.

They were too late as Zeo was defeated and knocked out by Neo.

"ZEO!!" Leo cried out as he goes to check on his older brother.

"Guess he doesn't have what it takes." Neo said coldly.

"Neo. You need to end this now! Look what this Wicked Avatar has done with your brother!" Leo said.

"It showed him that he got in my way and it put him down for the count." Neo said.

"Listen to me, Neo. The only reason you're like this is because that card is messing with your head. You have to destroy it!" Leo begged.

"Like that's gonna happen." Neo said.

"Please, Neo! You can't keep on doing this!" Alexis begged in tears.

"Don't worry, Alexis, you'll have your turn. In fact, it'll be sooner than you think. For now, see ya." Neo said before disappearing in black flames.

Leo and Alexis decided to get Neo later and took Zeo to the Medical room.
12121212111111122.title: With Leo and Alexis

121212121111111221.content:
We see Zeo lying unconscious in a medical bed. He hasn't wakened up since his battle with Neo. Ms. Fontaine was checking on him while Leo, Alexis, Jaden, Syrus, Chumley, Zane, Jasmine and Mindy come in to see what's happening so far.

"How's he doing?" Leo asked in concern for his older brother's health.

"Still the same, I'm afraid. That monster of Neo's really hit him hard." Ms. Fontaine said.

"Will he be okay, though?" Jaden wondered.

"Yes. But, he might be like this for a while." Ms. Fontaine explained.

"This is gonna continue until Neo wipes out everyone in this academy." Zane said.

"Then what?" Syrus wondered.

"I don't know. But, I shuddered to think of what he could do next with that Wicked Avatar of his." Zane explained.

Jasmine then got furious and turns it to Alexis.

"OOHHH! You did this, Rhodes!" Jasmine yelled at her friend.

"Jasmine!" Mindy said in shock of Jasmine's outburst towards Alexis.

"You just had to open your mouth and said bad things about Neo and this is what we ended up with! Way to go, Alexis!" Jasmine yelled

"ENOUGH!!!" Leo yelled to shut Jasmine up.

"Now, listen! Blaming Alexis won't solve this problem nor anything else! Cause right now, we've got bigger problems to deal with. So, try to keep your cool. That's all I asked for, okay?" Leo suggested to Jasmine.

"Right. Sorry, Alexis." Jasmine apologized as she calms down.

"It's fine." Alexis said and knows that what Jasmine said is true. Because, she is the reason that Neo's is on an emotional dueling rampage.

"What do we do now?" Jaden wondered.

"You all need to stay here. I'm going after Neo. He's my little brother, after all." Leo said.

"No." Alexis said out loud.

They all turned to Alexis when she said that.

"I'm gonna duel him." Alexis said.

"SAY WHAT?!?!" Syrus and Chumley said in shock at the same time.

"You heard me right. I'm gonna duel him myself." Alexis said.

"Alexis! Are you out of your mind?!" Jaden asked also in shock.

"If you do this, you'll end up like Zeo and everyone else that Neo's taken out." Zane said trying to reason with her.

"I've made up my mind. I'm gonna duel him and that's final." Alexis said.

"It's suicide!" Ms. Fontaine said.

"Yeah! You'll get massacred!" Mindy said in fear of her friend's life.

"I understand that, guys. But, it's my fault that we're in this mess. Now, I've get to be the one to get us out of it and bring Neo back to his senses." Alexis said.

Leo looked at Alexis in her eyes and sees that she really wants-, no, needs to do this. He widened his eyes as he sees something else in the eyes of the Queen.

"You love my brother, don't you?" Leo wondered.

"It took me a while, but yes. I do." Alexis said.

Leo can tell that she truly does love Neo. He then decided on how to prepare her.

"Meet me at the Dueling Stage in an hour. Don't be late." Leo suggested.

"Why?" Alexis wondered.

"For your test. If you really love Neo, then you must prove that if it's enough to save him." Leo said.

Alexis widened her eyes in surprise which then turned to a look of defiance.

"You got it!" Alexis said.

Leo and Alexis go on their separate ways and everyone hoped that Alexis knows what she's doing.
121212121111111221.title: At the Medical room

choices: Skip to the end of the duel
1212121211111112211.content:
Leo was at his Ra Yellow dorm room to prepare for his test duel with Alexis. He got his deck ready and he goes out to the Dueling Stage to meet with her. As he walks, he spotted a card on the ground. When he bends down and picks it up, he widened his eyes when he saw what card it is.

"It's Neo Sora-rai, the Samurai of the Sky. It's Neo's favorite card in his deck. He must've tossed it away. That Wicked Avatar is so evil that it made him tossed away his most treasured card. I'll keep it with me so I'll have a piece of whatever good is left in him." Leo thought as he put the card away and goes to the arena.

He made it there and he sees Alexis coming in with no fear on her face.

"You're just in time. I hope you're ready for this." Leo said.

"I am. And I'm not gonna hold back on you, Leo." Alexis declared.

"Wouldn't expect anything less from you, Your Majesty." Leo joked a little.

Leo and Alexis activated their duel disks to begin this test duel.

"Game on!" Leo and Alexis declared.

Leo: 8000

Alexis: 8000
1212121211111112211.title: Alexis's test

choices: Leo and everyone else's P. O. V
12121212111111122112.content:
Leo was winning by 1800 life points with Leonidas on the field while Alexis has 800 life points with Etoile Cyber on the field. The others are in the background watching how this duel will come about.

"If this is the best you've got, Alexis, then my brother will annihilate you with no problem. I guess I was wrong about making this duel with you. So, I suggest you give up while you have the chance." Leo said with his eyes closed.

"No way!" Alexis cried out.

Everyone was surprised by her outburst while Leo was smirking with one eye opened as he knows that would fire her up.

"I made a promise to myself and to Neo that I would save him and right the biggest wrong of my life. So, there's no way that I'll give up! I'll win this duel, no matter what it takes." Alexis said with passion.

"Then show me what you're made of." Leo said.

"You got it. Here we go!" Alexis said as she draws her card.

She looks at it and likes what she sees.

"First, I'll play the spell Polymerization! Now, I'll fuse my Etolie Cyber with Blade Skater that's in my hand to create Cyber Bladet!" Alexis said.

Cyber Blader: 2100 ATK 800 DEF

"Then, I'll equip her with Fusion Weapon. Since she's a lever 6 or lower fusion monster, she gets 1500 ATK and DEF." Alexis explained.

Cyber Blader: 3600 ATK 2300 DEF

"Now attack Leonidas with Fusion Weapon!" Alexis declared.

"Well, that is a cool move, Alexis. However, I'll still survive this duel even with Leonidas destroyed." Leo said.

"No you won't!" Alexis corrected.

"Huh?" Leo asked.

"Cause, I'm activating my Ego Boost spell card. Now, Cyber Blader's ATK gets increased by 1000, giving me the win." Alexis said.

"What?!" Leo said in shock.

Cyber Blader destroys Leonidas. Thus, ending the duel.

Leo: 0

"You did it, Alexis!" Jaden said happily.

"I never doubted her for a second." Zane said proudly

"So, how did I do?" Alexis wondered.

"Well, if I was a teacher right now, I'd give that duel an A+. Not everyone could beat me with Leonidas on the field and you did just that. You're ready." Leo said.

"Alright!" Syrus said.

"Yes!" Jasmine and Mindy said at the same time

"Licious!" Chumley said.

"Oh! Two more things before we go." Leo said.

"What is it? Is it something about the test that you left out?" Alexis wondered.

"No. It's just that Neo still has custody of the Wicked Avatar and I fear that it's getting astringent with every duelist he defeats. So, if you win, both my brother and the world is saved. If he wins, we're doomed. Simple as that." Leo explained.

"I know that. So, what's the hold up?" Alexis wondered.

"Well, I'll have to be honest. When we first met you, I thought you were some spoiled rotten popular girl that wouldn't take a guy's feeling without shoving them back in their faces in a cold way. But, I was wrong. You proved that you're a caring, kindhearted girl and I know that my brother would be lucky to have you in his life and he's gonna need you more than ever to heal his emotional wounds." Leo said.

Alexis cried up in happiness as she heard his words and she knows that he's right.

"Also, take these." Leo said as he shows Alexis some cards.

Alexis dries her eyes as she sees Leo's, Zeo's and, especially, Neo's ace monsters.

"These are your's and your brother's cards. Why are you giving them to me?" Alexis wondered.

"So that you know that we're all fighting beside you. Also, Neo would like you to have him." Leo explained.

Alexis nodded as she took the cards and put them in her deck.

"Hey! Now, I have only one question. How are we gonna find Neo? He could be anywhere on the island." Jaden wondered.

"I might have a clue on where he could be." Leo said.

"Then let's go." Alexis said before everyone leaves.

The walked down the forest area of the island and were making sure that they're on the right track. Then they came to an old building that's familiar to everyone.

"The Abandoned Dorm." Syrus said.

"Man! How I hate this place!" Chumley said as he was scared.

"You think that Neo's in there?" Zane wondered.

"I have a gut feeling about it." Leo answered.

"Then let's not waste anymore time." Jaden suggested.

"HOLD IT!!" A voice cried out.

They turned to see Chazz, Dr. Crowler, Chancellor Shepherd and the Ra Yellow genius, Bastion coming in.

"What are you guys doing here?" Jasmine wondered.

"Alexis! Please, reconsider about this duel! We've already had a lot of students taken out by this madness. We don't that to happen to you too!" Crowler begged

"Seriously! You can't go through with this!" Chazz begged too.

"I told these guys already that I'm gonna duel him and that's what I'm gonna do." Alexis said.

"But, you saw that demonic thing of Neo's! That's not a Duek Monster! That's the End of the World!" Bastion added.

"I know. But, I need to do this and that's that." Alexis said.

"But-!" Chazz was interrupted.

"Let her go." Leo said.

"Huh?" Everyone asked.

"She already made up her mind and nothing's gonna change it. Besides, she already proved that she's ready for this." Leo said.

"Are you sure?" Shepherd wondered.

"Yep! If anyone can get the old Neo back, it's her!" Jaden said.

"That's right!" Syrus and Chunley said at the same time.

Shepherd looked at Akexis and can see the fire in her eyes and he comes to conclusion.

"Go on then." Shepherd suggested.

"CHANCELLOR SHEPHERD!!" Crowler yelled in shock.

"Thank you." Alexis said.

"Let's go then." Leo said as everyone goes into the old Abandoned Dorm.

They go down the hallway and Bastion goes up to Leo for a talk.

"How can you be so sure that Alexis will beat Neo? Many others have tried and they all failed." Bastion wondered.

Leo looks at Akexis before giving Bastion his answer.

"It's because she has conviction and a promise to keep to my little brother. So, I believe that she'll win for sure." Leo explained.

"For their sake, I hope you're right." Bastion said.

"Me too, Bastion. Me too." Leo thought.

They reached tri the end of the hall and found a big door in front of them.

"He must be in there." Leo said.

"Guys. This is my fight. So, I'm going in alone." Alexis said.

"You sure?" Zane wondered.

"Yes. I need to face him on my own." Alexis answered.

"We'll be right behind you whenever you need us." Jaden said.

"Yeah! We're always be there for you no matter what!" Jasmine said.

"Good luck, Alexis." Zane said.

"Give it your all!" Syrus said.

"Seriously! Bring our friend back!" Chumley said.

"You can do this, Alexis." Shepherd said.

"We believe in you." Crowler said.

"Yeah! Show him what you're made of." Chazz said.

"You have passion. Use it well." Bastion said.

"Now go get your boyfriend back." Mindy said.

Alexis giggled at her comment.

"Thanks, Guys." Alexis said before turning to Leo.

"Like I said, my brother will be happy to have you in his life. Now, bring him back home." Leo said.

Alexis nodded before the doors opened and she breathes in and out to relax. She steps inside and the doors started to close slowly as everyone watches her enter to what could be the biggest duel of her entire life.

135231.content:
Your thorough planning for world domina-I mean trying to deal with a brand new surrounding with need to wait. You have the opportunity of taking a tour around the new city with a cute girl on your very first day. If you botch this up, you might ruin your one and only chance of a bright beautiful future in your new home.
"Sure. I hate being cooped up," you humbly admitted, "it's way too quiet!" 'Quiet' was actually code for 'lonely'.

"Great! Let's go!" wasting no time, she grabbed your hand and dragged you off with her! Good thing you locked the front door a microsecond before she grabbed ya.
It's a good thing one of your nannies made you join a track team when you were younger, cuz Luna was putting your ability to run long distance for a long period of time to the test! Maybe she's on a track team too. Or maybe it's that radiance about her making her move faster than the weak boring girls back at your own home! Hm.

The streets were crowded with tons of people. From what you read in the brochure, New Domino City is a heavily populated city with at least three times as many people living in it than your old city. Despite the heavy population, it was still a city restricted to the high-bracket income populace. Every single person working in this city made at least $100,000 a year. Anything lower probably got separated from the rich folk and are striving to make ends meet in the Satellite, like one of your old nannies. Even though you were born with a silver spoon in your spoon, you learned to treat the struggling lower class with respect. One day, THEY might make it big!

You eyed most of the people around you, wearing fancy designer suits, seeing them carry high-tech cellphones, driving cars recently released on the market, walking electronic pets, playing cards games on the street with fancy hand-held holographic simulators! You almost cringed at the huge Summoned Skull that Luna dragged you through!

"Hey, you want a hot dog?" Luna asked you, pointed over to the hot dog stand nearby.
"Eh, sure," you obliged as you pulled out your wallet cuz you were always taught that the gentleman pays. By then, she had already rushed up to the guy at the stand.
"Two hot dogs with everything, please!" she ordered.
"Arrighty," said the hot dog man. You rustled through your wallet as he slapped weiners on the buns, added ketchup, mustard, relish, onions, garlic, tomatoes, bbq sauce, steak sauce, worcestershire sauce, and cheese in record time!
"Aright! That'll be $40!" FORTY BUCKS?! $20 for a friggin hotdog! What a royal ripoff! Who in their right mind would pay-
"Keep the change!" your jaw literally dropped when Luna slapped a $50 bill on the counter! You practically froze up in absolute shock that she'd not even flinch at the prize and even offered a tip!
"Yes ma'am!" smiled the shady hot dog con-artist!

Even after a walk down the street, you were STILL in a state of shock! The hot dog wasnt even that good! It tasted like there was dog in it! But you gratefully forced that nasty dog down because your brand new friend had the guts to fork over $20 for it AND a $10 tip! Like your mom used to say, guess you better learn to keep up with the Kardashians... yeah, you hated that show, too!

"How's the hot dog?" Luna asked.
"It's uh... er... great," you tried to keep a straight face, "but... isnt $40 a little much to spend on these little guys?"
Luna just shrugged her shoulders, "Eh, dont worry. It was just loose change found in my piggy bank."
"L...Loose change?"
"Yep. My allowance is about $400 a week."
"!!!!" you almost choked on your hotdog hearing that! Even YOU aint that rich! And your dad is a governor!
Thankfully, she didnt notice you nearly choking to death! You silently pounded your chest and coughed a little.

*zzzZOOOOOOMMM!!!*
"WHOA!" you jumped back the split second two big trippy looking motorbikes zipped past you and earth-shattering speed! You blinked for several seconds as your heart raced. The motorbikes just zipped out of nowhere and probably went a few hundred miles over the speed limit! One them came extremely close to hitting you! Luna didnt look phased by that fact nor the fact that you almost got hit by it!
"D-D-DID YOU SEE THAT?!"
"Yeah! Wasnt it cool?!" Luna asked.
"That was not cool! That bike coulda hit me!" you were not living this one down, "did anybody get the license plate number?"
"Relax, [Yuri]," your new friend cooled you down, "theyre just having a card battle."
You blinked dumbfoundedly, "...A card battle? At 300 miles an hour? Where people drive?"
Luna nodded, "Of course,. It's called a Turbo Duel. You ever heard of it?" 'Turbo Duel'?

You scratched your head. You recall reading something about Turbo Duels in the brochure. That's what they are? Legal card game drag races?
"Never... seen one up close," you boldly answer. Hopefully you never do. Geez, New Domino City is gonna take a LOT of getting used to. But for the sake of you very first friend in this big super-rich high-tech town, you had to grin and bear in.

"So, uh..." you caught your breath, "where shall we go next?"
135231.title: Keeping up with the Card-ashians...

1352311.content:
"It's still pretty early... wanna check out the arcade?" Luna asked you. Arcade. ARCADE! She didnt have to ask you twice!
"Arcade?! Absolutely!" you tossed your hotdog in the trashcan and beamed with anticipation!
You gazed up at the ginormous corporate building open to the public, turned into a family-friendly amusement center! KaibaCorp! A corporation that was owned by an old rich snob that got rich by duping another old rich snob! You heard about this place, but never seen it yourself. Home of the world's largest annual Duel Monsters tournament. People come from far and wide to duel and compete, but very few even make it far enough to be recognized. Of course there's also a family fun center, arcade machines, sports center, and even a casino for the older crowd

Two big bad Blue Eyes White Dragon statues stood guard in front of the doors. They looked just as scary as you imagined the 'real' ones were! But Luna held your hand and guided you past the big bags and through the metal detectors and into the hall!

Majority of the hall were Duel Monsters holographic simulators, but without a deck of your own, you resorted to going to the row of few arcade machines they had left. Thankfully, Luna didnt mind playing House of the Undead with you.
Luna spent a huge chunk of her quarters trying to catch up with you cuz she wasnt a great shot with the gun-zapper, but you made it straight to the Emperor and blasted it's ectoplasmic heart out on just one simple quarter. Half of the time, you werent even looking at the screen as you fired and were still a darn good shot!
Lucky break, you clearly impressed Luna with your l33t zombie shooting kills!
"H...How did you do that?" you asked you.
You just smiled and shrugged your arms, "Heh... had a lot practice with a gun. An old nanny of mine, Enrica used to teach me how to fire a real one."

This sparked her competitive side.
"Ok! Best 2 out of 3!" Luna grabbed your hand and pulled you toward the Dance Dance Revelation machine! She put in her quarter... and just halfway through I'm Glad You Came, you were out-stepping her! End Result: C for her... AAA+ for you. "Another nanny of mine taught me how to dance. Sheila, I think her name was!"

"Th...th... that was... incredible!" she was practically exhausted, "...uh... can we... uh... try something less intense?”

You smirked, “Sure. How bout the crane ga-”

“HEY SIS! WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?!” just then, you heard a girlish voice shout out and interrupt you! Luna was quick to react to that voice. She turned her head to… a reflection?

No! A twin! Another girl who looks EXACTLY like Luna! Same green hair, yellow eyes, face, and outfit, only SHE had a blue shirt and had her hair in a short thick pony-tail! She gave off a radiance similar to Luna.
Even though she staring angrily at you, she looked just as cute as your new friend!

‘Twins!! Yeah!!’ you were arm-thrusting in your mind, ‘I hit the jackpot!’ Today was a GOOD day to be alive!
“Leo, do you mind? I;m kinda busy.”
“Of course, I mind, sis!” Leo crossed her arms and glared, “youre supposed to be at home studying for the big test tomorrow!”
“Uh… so are you!” Luna replied.
“I am!” Leo pointed to the duel disk on her arm, “I’m in a study group! But never mind me! Who’s THIS creep youre with?” Creep?

You tried to calm and civil to Luna’s twin like a true gentleman. Ladies are present. “Ah, so you must be Luna’s sibling, Leo? Short for Leona, perhaps? It’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance, ma’am.”
Leo squinted his eyes in a disgusted expression, “I’M A GUY, YOU MORON!”

…OH! Dear! One of THOSE twins! Oops!
“OH… uh heheheh,” you laughed nervous, “well, this is awkward.” Luna held back the urge to snicker. Leo was in was no laughing mood.
It was the sister's turn to try to soften the tension.
"Uh, Leo, this is our new neighbor, [Yuri]. [Yuri], this is my..." Luna held back another chuckle, "...BROTHER, Leo."
"Short for Leonidas! Like the Spartan!" Leo lied, "...and isnt [Yuri] a girl's name?"
"It is?" you tilted your head curiously, "anyway, Luna was just showing me around your city."

"And who gave YOU permission to follow my little sister around?!" as expected, he activates the Overprotective Big Brother card!
"Oh cool it, Leo!" said Luna, "I knocked on his door and offered to show him around."
"You WHAT?!" her bro went ballistic, "sis, do you have any idea how dangerous that is?! We're supposed to be together when we talk to strangers!"
"Since when was that ever a rule?!" Luna was flabbergasted, "wait. Scratch that. Since when were YOU ever the type to 'play it safe'?!"

Oh great. You just stumbled into a hefty family dispute.

"Since I just caught my little sister hanging out with a shady guy I never seen before!" 'Shady'? Ok, now he's pushing it.

"Excuse me, 'Leonidas'," you spoke up, raising your finger, "if youre insinuating that I'm trying to cause trouble with your sister, you are deeply mistaken."

"Pst!" he PSTed in your face and squinted his eyes at you, sizing you up, "I'm not worried about you causing trouble. Because you aint even in the same league as me and sis!"

"I'm sorry about my brother," Luna apologized, "let's just leave, before-"
"Hey! Youre not going anywhere! Especially not with HIM!"
"Leo..." Luna's voice got stern.
"It's alright sis," Leo assures her, "dont worry. I'm just gonna put this loser in his place!"
"Dude, I have a red belt..." you whispered. Thankfully, he wasnt gonna FIGHT you.

"So... you gonna be enrolled in Duel Academy as well?"
"Er, I think I am."
"Cool!" he whipped out a deck of cards and brandished his duel disk, "Then you up for a quick game of Duel Monsters, wimp?" ...Oh... cards.

"Sorry, I dont play Duel Monsters," you regretfully turned him down, "my father wont let me buy those cards. He has this strange belief that the cards are somehow haunted and have magical powers... can you believe that silliness?" You chuckled a little.

"Uh... yeah... silly..." for some reason, Luna was having difficulty keeping a straight face.

Unfortunately, that didnt matter to Big Bro.
"That's fine. I'll just let you borrow one of my friends!"
"Leo, he's never played before."
"So? If he's enrolled in Duel Academy, he's gonna need to start learning the basics!" he smirked at you, "consider this a little lesson in thinking on your feet... and in pain!"

Ugh... he's got a point about Duel Academy. All those rich kids are gonna be learning Duel Monsters inside and out. Youre gonna have to as well, or you just might get your butt handed to you. Plus, you gotta wipe that smirk off Leo's face if you wanna win his respect.

...Then again, would it even win Luna's?!

To add heavier emphasis on how lonely she was, nobody else was sitting in ANY of the rows of benches nearby. In fact, you saw a few students that pass by walk completely around the benches with worried looks on their faces. As if theyre trying to avoid her for some reason.

"Gee, that's kinda sad," you said to yourself as you felt sorry for the lonely red-head, "I still got time to spare. Maybe I should go over there and say hi."

You stepped toward the girl... then suddenly stopped when you felt something stop you. You didnt know what it was, but it seemed hostile. Maybe it was some kind of mental warning or something. Premonition?
"Hm," you thought about it. You couldnt explain the sudden bad feeling, but for some reason you couldnt just shrug it off either.

Maybe it's just your imagination. Or maybe it's something else...

What do you do?

135321211.content:
To heck with the bad feeling! Maybe it's a minor allergy or something. You can take medicine for that. In the meantime, you didnt wanna be one of the rare lonely students in Duel Academy and youre pretty sure neither did her. You took a deep breath and walked toward the red-haired girl, ready to get her attention.

"H-"

Suddenly, someone came at you at super turbo hyper alpha speed and knock you almost a few yards away! The girl barely heard your yipe, but probably didnt see where it came from.
As for you, when the dust cleared, you realized somebody just performed a spear on you! You thought this was a school for card games, not professional wrestling! You were ready to bite the head of the jerk that just tackled you, but noticed he was giving you quite a terrified look!

"Dude! Are you out of your mind?!" snapped the black haired student with a cap, tiny chin goatee and gray eyes in a Slifer Red blue uniform, "you got a death wish or something? Believe me, life's hard, but it aint worth it!"
"What the heck are you-" you pause in mid-sentence as realizing the guy with a cap's STILL on top of you, "get off me!"
"Oh," he got off you and helped you up, "sorry about that. But it was for your own good. You coulda got hurt really bad."
Fitting he says that while your back is aching! "Erg... I AM hurting really bad!"

"Good lord, Junpei! What the flying hell is wrong with you?!" suddenly another student came stomping toward the two of you who looked just as outraged as you do! A slightly taller long black haired pony tailed guy with a neatly designed apache necklace and little white feathered earrings, "you coulda snapped that poor guy's spine doing a reckless stunt like that!" Whoever he is, you appreciate HIS concern! "I'm really sorry about my friend. Are you ok?"
Before you could answer, the other guy spoke up, "Ok, ok. MAYBE I overdid it a little. But it was all I could think of doing cuz he was getting really really close to... her!"
The new guy raised his eyebrow, "...Her?" Junpei pointed to that red haired girl you were about to say hi to and his friend's eyes widened with almost as much fear as Mr. Tackles! He ushered his head toward, signaling to follow.
"Dont give her any eye contact," he whispered.

What's up with these two? Something they dont like about that girl you were trying to get friendly with?
"Will somebody care to tell me what's going o-"
"Shh!" the guy with a cap shushed you, "not so loud. If she finds we're talking about her, she might curse us or something!"
"Who?" you whispered.
"You dont know?" the long-haired guy looked at you oddly, "you MUST be new to this school. I'm Lupe, by the way. The guy who saved your life earlier is Junpei." Saved your life?!
"Sup?" Junpei smiled.
You pointed to yourself and made the introduction quick, "[Hunter]. Now tell me what's going on!"

"That girl you were getting close to," Lupe explained, "bad things have been happening around her." This wasnt gonna end well.
You squinted your eyes suspiciously, "What do you mean?"
"There's something about her," Junpei joined in, "I know it sounds hard to believe, but I think she's got like magic powers or something!"
"Seems that way," Lupe agreed, "everyone that she duels either gets in a bad accident or suddenly disappears. It's happened with a lot of students lately."
"Yeah," Junpei remarked, "they say when she duels, the monsters come to life. When they attack, they'll actually hurt you!"
"That's not counting sudden fires, blackouts, and random explosions that occurred since she enrolled at this school."

Ouch. What kind of sick joke are these guys playing?! "Youre joking, right?"
"Dude, this isnt a joke!" Junpei sounded dead serious, "I've seen it happen! I knew this one guy who was a few years my senior, he was a straight-A Obelisk Blue, on the honor role and had an early scholarship offer from a fancy university... then he dueled her and almost got eaten alive by her Black Rose Dragon card!" What in all that is- "The next day, he suddenly dropped out of school and I never heard from him since!" 'That's ridiculous!' you think to yourself. But it wasnt over.
"I heard that some of the teachers flat out refused to take her in their classes because theyre terrified of her," Lupe noted, "even her parents are scared of her."
"I heard that sometimes she hangs out at this school around midnight and the security dont do anything cuz theyre afraid to get close to her."
"I heard that that she grows a garden of white roses on her front lawn... and she paints them red by feeding them with human blood." Ok, this was getting too much for you!
"I heard that if you stick one of her cards in your butt, you'll turn into a flower!" you add sarcastically.

Both of them actually turned their heads to you and went, "REALLY?!" in unison!
"No, you idiots!" you almost shout, "youre seriously gonna believe every little thing you hear? Arent you guys a little old for childish rumors like that?!"
"You can ask anybody else in this school, [Hunter]," Lupe told you, "if you even mention the name 'Akiza' to anybody, theyre gonna jump out of their skin!"
So you got her name. "Akiza?"
"SHH!" both of them shush you.

"I know ya mean well, [Hunter]," Junpei said, "but she's known as the Black Witch of Duelist Academy for a reason."

"Black... Witch...?" the name rings a bell. Specifically the rumor about a witch. You took a look back at Akiza, but notice she was already gone. You sighed hard. Does she really have THIS bad a rep in this school? You felt sorry for her, but at the same time, you got a bit concerned. You know youre supposed to ignore silly rumors and let the bs blow in the breeze, but...

"Well, we better start heading to class," Junpei interrupted your train of thought, "the bell's gonna ring pretty soon."
"Yeah, c'mon [Hunter]," Lupe told you, "the building for the Slifer Red classes are this way."

You nodded and started to follow... when you spotted a little card lying on the bench. Maybe that red haired girl left it behind?
Since youre a witness, you'd hate to just walk away and pretend you didnt see it. You thought about picking it up and rightfully returning it to it's rightful owner. That's always a surefire way to win points with a girl!
You stepped toward the bench, but then that bad feeling came back! It suddenly made you think about all that gobbledegook Lupe and Junpei were talking about. If Akiza is as dangerous as those two make her sound, do you dare touch any of her belongings? For all you know, THEY could be cursed!
...Urgh... are you actually considering believing that crap?!

"Hey [Hunter]!" Junpei shouted, "ya coming or not?!"

"Y-Yeah! I'm coming!" you shout back as you thought. You decide to...

1353212111.content:
Your first thought was to leave the card where it was, due to the bad feeling, but then you noticed it was Akiza's Black Rose Dragon. So you picked it and give it to her in class.

Lupe and Junpei were just a few seconds in the room before you were. When you opened the door you saw Akiza on the left side in the third row. Around her was nobody. Either they sat on the right side or at least 2 rows away from her. You felt very sorry for her.
Junpei was waving at you to sit on the chair next to him but instead you took a place next to Akiza. The whole class frowned. Even the Professor. The bad feeling you had 10 minutes ago came back and was worse then before. You could hardly stand it.
"Hi, my name is [Hunter]." You said to Akiza. No response. "Oh look I've found one of your cards." You took the Black Rose Dragon out of your pocket and laid it on the table. You said with a smile and the bad feeling was decreasing.

During the lesson you couldn't concentrate very well, cause you had to look at her all the time. Her pretty face, her beautiful hair and her damn hot body...you couldn't think of anything else until she saw you staring. "Is something with my face?" she said with an angry voice. "Oh no, I didn't want to offend you. You're just.." "WHAT?" "Beautiful..."

"Oh this was unexpected due to everybody is feared of her", Lupe said, "well then when you want to put your life on the line please don't expect us to stand behind you. Man i like you but that's too risky for me. When you wanna hang out with us, no problem but not when you're with her."
"I still don't get it...but ok. We'll see after break." you said. "Where do you go?" Junpei asked. "Use your sawy!" you answered with a wink.

Well first of all you were searching for the rest room and right after that you ran along the hallway down to where you've found Akiza's Dragon. She was sitting there with a thoughtful face. You approached her and instantly and felt again this feeling that you're not welcome. When she noticed you, the bad feeling vanished. She even had a little smile on her face. "Umm....hi Akiza." Which do you choose?
1353212111.title: First personal encounter.

13532121112.content:
You decided to have a bratwurst, cuz it looked ever so much like a hotdog. And you LOVE hotdogs. Combine it with the sausagey flavor that a bratwurst offers and it'd be the best damn hot dog you've ever eaten. Of course, a bit of ketchup, mustard, and relish also helps bring out the natural flavor. You also had a slice of strudel because... that's the only German desert I know off the top of my head at the moment without looking it up. I woulda added Kinder beer, but the Duel Academy has zero tolerance for beer of ANY kind!

Akiza for some reason didnt have anything. Her plate was empty and she didnt bother to go up and get something. She just stared into space sipping her coke as you ate your bratwurst.
"You... youre not getting anything?" you asked her.
"I'm a vegetarian," she answered, "and I dont trust the quality of the 'vegetarian' menu they serve here." You dont know about her, but they at least know how to cut a decent bratwurst. Besides, doesnt Coke contain an animal fat?
"Well, arent you gonna eat something?" you asked, "at least a power bar or something to keep you from starving. We still got a half a day of class left."
But Akiza sweated no hunger. "I'll find something to eat after school. Like I always do."
You shrugged your arms and finished eating. You couldnt force her to do anything... besides, she's probably used to it. She's also probably used to the scared stares the two of you were getting from several other students sitting around you. Akiza just sipped her coke casually and unbothered, but you were starting to get annoyed by it. You knew WHY they were staring. And it was not cool. Not cool at all.

"Just ignore them," Akiza whispered, as if sensing you were about to do something you'd regret, "they'll only get more paranoid if you respond to them."
"But it's not right the way they-"
"Trust me," she interrupted, "you'll only make it worse if you react." You noticed her blankly staring the direction of two girls standing by the doorway to the cafeteria in orange sashes around her arms. You could feel an aura of hostility between them.

"I'd better go before they get suspicious," she picked up her tray and got out of her seat.
"W-wait, why-"
"Pretend you dont know me," she whispers, "maybe we can talk again, later."
"But... I..." and just like that, the Witch of Duel Academy was gone. It was kinda depressing to see her go so abruptly after managing to bond with her so well. But she probably had her reasons. She had the academy's scarlet letter after all. But you quickly lose your appetite and decide you throw away your bratwurst after it was only 2 or 3 bites away from finished!

You dump out your leftover food in the trashcan and put the tray on top of it before heading out the door.

"Excuse me," but just when you got through the doorway, you were stopped by one of the girls with orange sashes. Facing you was a black haired girl who was wearing a kabuki mask depicting a sad maiden's face and wielding a rather big kendo stick. Despite the mask covering her face, you could sense the eyes behind it gazing deep into yours with intensity.

"Y...yes?" you asked as the other girl in the orange sash closed up behind you. A very tall girl with white hair, pale skin and freckles, purple eyes, and a rather er... fit body that looked like she's been to the gym quite a bit.

"If we could just take a moment of your time," the girl in the mask spoke, "we'd like to ask you a few questions." You didnt like the way that sounded. You suspected something bad was up. And even the big girl behind you getting too close for comfort amplified it!
Still, you kept your cool and asked, "What is it?"

The masked girl put a hand to her chin, "We couldnt help but notice that girl you were sitting awfully close with..." You didnt like how she added 'awfully' like it was a bad thing! "You wouldnt happen to know who that girl is, do you?" That is an odd question.
"Why? What's it to you?" you got suspicious yourself.

"Nami ask you simple question," the girl behind you replied in a thick accent that was probably SUITABLE for German's Day, "you just give her simple answer, ja?"
"I dont really know what youre asking of me," you replied to her, "is there something wrong?"
"That might depend, " the masked girl that you assumed is named 'Nami' answered, "but like Swallow said, it was a simple question I asked. Do you have a problem answering it?" What is this, an interrogation?!
"Will you please let me go?"
"Vhy arent you answering question?" the thick accented Swallow leaned down at you, "you hiding somezhing?" Your eyebrow twitched when you saw Nami grip the handle of her kendo stick a little harder!

"[Hunter]! There ya are, I been looking all over for ya!" suddenly, you hear Junpei shouted over at you as he rushes over to you and the 'hall monitors' "geez, I thought we were gonna sit together! You couldnt wait another minute for me to make a pit stop?" As you wondered what he was doing, he drew the attention of Nami and Swallow.

"So you know this boy, Junpei?" Nami questioned him.

"Eh, he's a new kid, I thought I'd just show him around, give him the proper Duelist Academy welcome!" he then pretended to look surprised, "uh... what's up with you two? Did he do something wrong?"
"We seen him sitting together with... that girl," said the girl in the mask.
"What girl?" Junpei played dumb.
Swallow stared at him coldly and answered, "You know who zat girl is. Does HE?"

Junpei squinted his eyes, looking like he was thinking hard, then opened them with a feign surprise, "Oh! OH! Ohhh... THAT girl! Oh man, [Hunter] was hanging out with her?! Dude, you ok? You didnt get poisoned or anything did ya?!"
You gave him a weird look but before you could answer, Nami spoke up.
"So he doesnt know about her?" she tilted her head.
Junpei shook his, "Of course not! He's only been at this school for like a few hours! I havent gotten a chance to tell him about... the Witch."

"Perhaps you should," Nami warned him, "you wouldnt want your new friend messing around with matters that could get him hurt." Was that a threat?!

"A-A-Absolutely, Nami!" Junpei nodded hard and grabbed your arm, "I'm gonna tell him right away! C'mon, [Hunter]! We dont wanna be late for class!" And he dragged you away from the two were clearly staring your way until you left their field of vision.
"Dude! What is the matter with you?!" Junpei whispered to you, "are you trying to fill a death-defying quota or something?!"
You groaned, "What is it now, Junpei?! I'm getting kinda sick of this."
"And I'm getting kinda sick of dragging your butt out of the fire!" he told you, "what did I just get through telling you earlier? EVERYBODY stays away from the Black Witch."
"Not this again..."
"Not just because she's cursed," Junpei explained, "to the Student Council, she's an outlaw. They want nothing less than to destroy her. To see somebody just hanging around with her all buddy-buddy like nothing's wrong makes them suspicious."

You rubbed your aching ahead, "Youre kidding right? Am I seriously gonna have to put up with this ALL the time just cuz I wanna make friends with her?"
"Honestly, I think that's the least you gotta worry about," Junpei said, "the worst would be being EATEN BY HER BLACK ROSE DRAGON!"
Man, was that really ticking you off to the highest degree. Then again, Akiza herself did tell you to pretend you didnt know her. You cant help but wonder if you've mightve put a scarlet letter on yourself just for hanging around Akiza last class! Once again, the bad feeling returned... as if part of you told you the school's fear for her was justified, even though the rest of you told it to shut up! Perhaps you will have to put up with this all the time if you wanna land the Duel Academy Black Witch.

Changing the subject, it wasnt long before the bell rang and Junpei dragged you toward your next class.
What's your next class?
