152.content:
The duel for the Regional Championship was about to come to a close. With less than a thousand life-points remaining on both sides, your 2400 Attack point Jinzo alone facing down your opponent Ali's Great Beast Angra Mainyu with his 2800 Attack points, you were running out of exits. Your trump card, Dark Magician, had already taken a swan dive early and your hand is full of spell cards that woulda came in real handy for him!

But something deep down was telling you not to give up. Something deep down was telling you to wipe that prideful smirk off Ali's face. Despite losing your best cards, that spark of hope and willpower was still fighting strong. You didnt know what card you had left that could save you, but you put your faith in that spark (or as some refer to as 'The Heart of The Cards') and draw your next card.

'...WHAT?!'

You gazed down in disbelief at the card you just drawn. The Dark Magician Girl. A really really good card to pull right now. However, there's a slight issue.

You dont own a Dark Magician Girl. You NEVER owned a Dark Magician Girl! None of your backup decks contained Dark Magician Girls let alone the customized one you brought to the championship! How did this one end up in your deck? Did somebody sneak it in? Is it against the rules to have an undisclosed cards you dont even own slipped into your deck during the competition? You dont know whether you should more worried that you found a card you dont own in your deck or that you have broken a rule having a card you dont own in your deck!

“Brother, what is taking so long?!” Ali goaded you from the other side of the ring, “hurry up, already! Are you ready to surrender and admit defeat or do you wish to provide Angra Mainyu with another sacrifice?”
You decide to question this anomaly later and get back to the duel.
“Sorry Ali,” you regain your confidence, “I was just briefly stunned by the sheer beauty of the monster I'm about to summon to finish this duel!”
“Bring him then!” Ali demanded with pride, “he'll just be another stepping stone on my path of glorious conquest!”

“It's not a 'him', Ali!” you stated, “I sacrifice my Jinzo to summon the Dark Magician Girl!”
The image of Jinzo on the VR grid vanishes and it's place appeared a glowing occultish seal as a feminine figure emerged from it. A blonde-haired woman in blue armor with a seal broach in the middle, wearing a blue Dark Magician helmet and a pink skirt, and brandishing a scepter capable of casting dark magic to destroy her enemies! She spun around and you nearly lost yourself in the twinkle in her sparkling emerald green eyes before snapping out of it just in time to plan your attack. The useless spell cards in your hand just became detrimental.

“Heh, she certainly is a beauty, brother,” Ali laughs, “but she still pales in comparison to a Great Beast!”
“Hold on, I aint done yet, 'brother'!” you slap a spell card on the field, “I activate Magician's Scepter. This gives DMG an extra 500 Attack Point boost and raises her level to 7. Combined that with the 300 AP boost with my Dark Magician in the graveyard and both our monsters are evenly matched… that is until I activate this.”

Ali's arrogant grin disappeared as soon as he saw you activate the trap Resonance of Power. Thanks to DMG now being level 7, she gains an extra 800 AP boost!
“That puts her at 3600 attack points. You know what that means, Ali? Show him what it means, Dark Magician Girl!”

A strong surge of dark magical power enveloped her scepter and aimed it toward the great beast.
“NOOOOO!!!” Ali shouted in horror as his Angra Mainyu was caught in the explosion, leaving absolutely nothing behind in the smoke… and taking his remaining 800 life points with it! When the smoke finally cleared, the only things left in front of you in that ring were the Dark Magician Girl and the defeated Ali who had dropped to the floor lowering his head in utter shame. Geez, you didnt think he'd take losing THIS bad.

“WINNER AND THIS YEAR'S REGIONAL CHAMPION: [MICHAEL] O'NIVES!”
The crowd went wild for you. It was a proud day for you. All your hard work and training had finally paid off. You never felt so proud of yourself your whole life! Who cares if you won with a card you dont technically own and was mysteriously slipped into your deck? YOU WON!!!

However, just as you were beginning to savor your epic victory, something incredibly unusual happened. The Dark Magician Girl on the VR grid actually turned around and smiled at you. Then she clapped along with the audience for you! None of the duel monsters on the VR grid have EVER done something like this!

You blinked with your jaw dropping in disbelief just before her image disappears.
“D-D-DID YOU JUST SEE THAT?!”
“See what?” Ali groaned as he walked off with his head hung low, “my dreams of restoring the Great Persian Empire dashed to pieces? Yes, brother. I saw it clear as day...” What is his problem?!
Whatever it was, it wasnt as big as yours. The cheers from the audience seemed drowned out as you stared at your new Dark Magician Girl Card… who youre pretty sure wasnt winking in her portrait earlier.

Despite winning the championship, the anomaly bugged you all the way back to your hotel room. You couldnt sleep in preparation for the celebratory party tomorrow cuz of all the newbound stressed you developed. You spent hours sitting at a desk reviewing your decks, trying to remember when you ever picked up a DMG, but no such luck. No recollection whatsoever. Just looking at the card was making you uncomfortable.

The Duel Monster developers never made a winking Dark Magician Girl card as far as you know. Yet it's not fake, cuz the VR-grid wouldve detected counterfeits. Maybe it's a super rare card that was unreleased to the public? Even so, how did you manage to get your hands on it? Are you inadvertently breaking any laws just having it with you?

“Ugh...” you moan in frustration, “this is hopeless. I gotta go to bed.” You'll just have to ponder the magical mystery tomorrow. So after putting your decks away, brushing your teeth, and changing into your pjs, you shut off the light, hop into bed and close your eyes, too tired to even bother pulling the covers over.

...As a shadowy figure pulls the covers over you.
152.title: Do You Believe In Magic?

choices: ...She speaks... but not in a language you understand!
1521.content:
Your skeleton almost leaps out of your skin before the rest of your body does out of bed! You dont for even a nanosecond assume you were imagine things. Your imagination aint that great! Someone's in the hotel room with you! You got an intruder!

On survival instinct, you reach into your pocket and whip out your switch blade! If youre gonna be attacked, you aint going down without a fight!
Unfortunately, it's pitch black. You cant see a thing. Still, you look all directions gazing deep into the shadows as you inch for the lamp. Unfortunately, as you yanked the lamp chain, you bumped into a chair you forgot to push in earlier and slipped and fell.

You landed face first in the soft carpet, but at least you got the light on. Not to mention someone was generous enough to take your hand and help you off the floor.

"Ugh... thanks," you dusted yourself off and politely thanked the blonde woman in a blue armored she-mage outfit. Then your eyes widened at the blonde woman in a blue armored she-mage outfit! Intruder! INTRUDER!

"FREEZE!!" you shout, brandishing your switch-blade at the cute cosplayer! A weird fangirl just snuck into your room?! But how?! The door's locked and requires a special key only you and the hotel staff have! No sign of a window break-in either. So how else did she get in? Did she bribe hotel staff to let her in your room? Oh, this place is getting much worse than a 1-star review on Yelp! Your father was right. If youre gonna be famous, you need to hire armed security! But that's all neither here nor there!

"Dont make any sudden moves!" you warned the cosplaying fangirl, "take one step closer and so help me..."
She for some reason, didnt seem to look the least bit scared of you. If anything,that frown she was giving you was more of a look of concern than anything. Still, she aint attacking you so far, so good right?
As you glared daggers at this mysterious intruder, the wheels in your head began to turn. Still pointing your blade her way, you reach over to the table and pick up a particular Duel Monster card.

You look down at the card then up at her. Back down at the card then back up at her. Same hair, outfit, color of eyes... she even smiled at winked the same way... an exact splitting image of the Dark Magician Girl card in your hand!
She didnt just look similar to the Dark Magician Girl in your hand, it was completely uncanny! She could pass off as her holographic image on the VR-grid and like 99% of the spectators would never notice!

Nonetheless, you kept your guard up and your blade pointed to the DMG cosplayer.
"Gotta say," you kept your cool as you stared at her suspiciously, "that's the most authentic looking Dark Magician Girl outfit I've seen on anybody. I dont think I've seen ANYONE manage to pull HER off quite like you do!"
As if flattered by your comments, she smiled then put her hands behind her back and lifted her chin in a smug expression of pride.
"You got a name?" you finally ask for an introduction.
Instead of giving you one, or at the very least a NAME, she merely points to the card at your hand.
"Your REAL name, smartass!" you get impatient with her.
Again, she adamantly points to your card!
You gaze at her unamused, "Youre the Dark Magician Girl?"
She twirled around like some heroine in a magical girl cartoon then brandished her magic scepter and struck a magical girl pose! ...Wait, where in Ra's name did she pull out that scepter from?!

Wonderful. Just bloody wonderful. You got a creepy lunatic as a fangirl! You knew something was wrong when you had to stay in a hotel next to a mental hospital!

Still, keeping your cool yet being very unamused, very impatient, and very VERY tired, you interrogate your crazy intruder who thinks she's a Duel Monster card!

"Alright, 'Dark Magician Girl'," you gaze coldly at her, "how about telling me what youre doing in my room before I start calling the cops?"
Before she could give you an answer (as if was gonna give you one in the first place), the card in your hand suddenly glowed. Seriously, the glowy designs on it just emphasized it's glowiness as if on cue with your question. And then just after it stopped glowing, the wink on the DMG image was gone! That wink expression wasnt there anymore! Ok, are you seriously seeing things? Are you going as crazy as this loony Dark Magician Girl cosplayer?! ...Surely those stories about enchanted cards and reincarnations of Pharaohs and ancient beasts werent actually TRUE, right?!

This temporary panic kinda caused you to lower your guard involving the crazy intruder in your apartment. Maybe you are really just as crazy...

You sighed hard and put your switchblade away. Something told you she wasnt a threat to you. If she wanted to try something with you, she couldve done so while you had that mental distraction!
"You know, if you wanted an autograph, I coulda gave you one shortly after the championship."
DMG just tilted her head questionably.
"Look, it's awful late in the night to just sneak into people's hotel rooms," you tell her, "I think I read somewhere that it's legal for a hotel guest to shoot you for doing that."
DMG flinched after she heard that.
"But hey, I guess I cant blame you for wanting to sneak into MY room," you snickered a little, "after all, I am the new regional Duel Monsters champion... and soon to be World Champion if this little baby has something to say about it!" You kissed your Dark Magician Girl card. Unknown to you, the DMG cosplayer blushed.

Shortly after that statement, you begin to wonder again how you ever came across this card to begin with. Any memory of securing a Dark Magician Girl (let alone a super ultra rare one that winks!) was not stored in your brain. Perhaps youre too crazy to remember? Ugh.

"Um... go ahead and have a seat," you pointed over to the chair you tripped on. She gladly sits in it while you sit on your bed. "I dont think I need to introduce myself to you, considering you probably know me enough to wanna sneak into my room late at night." The DMG cosplayer almost cracked a chuckle. "But I dont think I know anything about you? How about you tell me who you are? Where youre from? Why youre here? C'mon, you owe me that."

She just stared at you intently. And of course silently.

"Er, can you talk?" you questioned, "cat got your tongue? Abla ingles?"

You waited patiently for a verbal response. ANY verbal response. The silent treatment was a bit too much for your crazy mind to handle!
